summary: Completed comprehensive testing of video surveillance system. All backend APIs (17/17) working perfectly. Frontend fully functional with successful camera management, navigation, and live streaming capabilities.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
Modal overlay interferes with dropdown selection, but form works with defaults

passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Camera CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Cameras, Recordings, Motion Events)
Recording and Motion Events page filtering
